## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Larry D. HUDSON v. STATE
**판결일**: 1987-06-30
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Alabama
**관할**: Alabama, AL

**판사**: Taylor

## 변호인

Roger S. Morrow, Wesley Romine, and Joel H. Pearson, Montgomery, for appellant., Charles A. Graddick, Atty. Gen., and Victor Jackson, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.

## 인용

- 542 So. 2d 945

## 판결문 요약


ON APPLICATION FOR REHEARING
TAYLOR, Judge.
The opinion previously issued in this case is hereby withdrawn and the following substituted therefor.
On the authority of Hannah v. State, 497 So.2d 837 (Ala.Cr.App.1986), this cause is reversed and remanded.
APPLICATION FOR REHEARING GRANTED; ORIGINAL OPINION WITHDRAWN; OPINION SUBSTITUTED; JUDGMENT REVERSED AND REMANDED.
All the Judges concur.
Writ quashed, Ala., 542 So.2d 946.
